item.title: BLURBSMITH Copywriting
item.description:
Need an ad, blurb, or slogan? I deliver quality, creative copywriting in whatever turnaround time is available.

I’m available now for writing of any nature.

I deliver exceptional copywriting and/or complete ad campaigns from conception to digital print.

Other Skills & Services

While words will always be my true love, they’re not my only love.

I code. Should you need a website, for any reason, I can deliver you a complete marketing campaign with.

I analyse. Rarely do the numbers lie and often do the numbers shock.

I optimise. Website performance and usability doesn’t support them. I also have a website performance service: if you have a website, I can make it loads faster. Visit www.loadsfaster.net for more info.

I think critically, and act accordingly. I believe there’s an easier answer to today’s email needs, so I’m building Maily.Pro. Visit www.maily.pro for more info.

CONTACT BLURBSMITH

Contact me today… I can have a campaign ready for you tomorrow.

Email: blurbsmith@maily.pro
Twitter: @BLURBSMITH_
